verses.verse: דְּבַר־ <S%H1697><s%> The word יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to צְפַנְיָה֙ <S%H6846><s%> which came unto Zephaniah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son כּוּשִׁ֣י <S%H3569><s%> Cushi בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גְּדַלְיָ֔ה <S%H1436><s%> of Gedaliah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲמַרְיָ֖ה <S%H568><s%> of Amariah בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חִזְקִיָּ֑ה <S%H2396><s%> of Hizkiah בִּימֵ֛י <S%H3117><s%> in the days יֹאשִׁיָּ֥הוּ <S%H2977><s%> of Josiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמ֖וֹן <S%H526><s%> of Amon מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

אָסֹ֨ף <S%H622><s%> I will utterly אָסֵ֜ף <S%H622><s%> assemble כֹּ֗ל <S%H3605><s%> all מֵעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> From פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> the face הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> of the earth נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

אָסֵ֨ף <S%H622><s%> assemble אָדָ֜ם <S%H120><s%> man וּבְהֵמָ֗ה <S%H929><s%> and beast אָסֵ֤ף <S%H622><s%> assemble עוֹף־ <S%H5775><s%> the fowls הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> of the heaven וּדְגֵ֣י <S%H1709><s%> and the fishes הַיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> of the sea וְהַמַּכְשֵׁל֖וֹת <S%H4384><s%> and the stumblingblocks אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> along הָרְשָׁעִ֑ים <S%H7563><s%> with the wicked וְהִכְרַתִּ֣י <S%H3772><s%> and I will cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> man מֵעַ֛ל <S%H5921><s%> from פְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> from off הָאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> the land נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וְנָטִ֤יתִי <S%H5186><s%> I will also stretch out יָדִי֙ <S%H3027><s%> mine hand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> upon Judah וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> and against כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> and upon all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem וְהִכְרַתִּ֞י <S%H3772><s%> and I will cut off מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַמָּק֤וֹם <S%H4725><s%> from this place הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7605><s%> the remnant הַבַּ֔עַל <S%H1168><s%> of Baal אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> [and] the name הַכְּמָרִ֖ים <S%H3649><s%> of the Chemarims עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> along הַכֹּהֲנִֽים׃ <S%H3548><s%> with the priests

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּשְׁתַּחֲוִ֥ים <S%H7812><s%> And them that worship עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַגַּגּ֖וֹת <S%H1406><s%> upon the housetops לִצְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> of heaven וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַמִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוִים֙ <S%H7812><s%> and them that worship הַנִּשְׁבָּעִ֣ים <S%H7650><s%> [and] that swear לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> by the LORD וְהַנִּשְׁבָּעִ֖ים <S%H7650><s%> and that swear בְּמַלְכָּֽם׃ <S%H4445><s%> Milcom

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּסוֹגִ֖ים <S%H5472><s%> And them that are turned back מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> from יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> God וַאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> who לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not בִקְשׁ֥וּ <S%H1245><s%> and [those] that have not sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or דְרָשֻֽׁהוּ׃ <S%H1875><s%> nor enquired

הַ֕ס <S%H2013><s%> Hold thy peace מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> at the presence אֲדֹנָ֣י <S%H136><s%> of the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <S%H3069><s%> GOD כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for קָרוֹב֙ <S%H7138><s%> [is] at hand י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> for the day יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֵכִ֧ין <S%H3559><s%> hath prepared יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> for the LORD זֶ֖בַח <S%H2077><s%> a sacrifice הִקְדִּ֥ישׁ <S%H6942><s%> he hath bid קְרֻאָֽיו׃ <S%H7121><s%> his guests

וְהָיָ֗ה <S%H1961><s%> will come בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in the day זֶ֣בַח <S%H2077><s%> sacrifice יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S וּפָקַדְתִּ֥י <S%H6485><s%> that I will punish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הַשָּׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> the princes וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> children הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> and the king's וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הַלֹּבְשִׁ֖ים <S%H3847><s%> and all such as are clothed מַלְבּ֥וּשׁ <S%H4403><s%> apparel נָכְרִֽי׃ <S%H5237><s%> with strange

וּפָקַדְתִּ֗י <S%H6485><s%> also will I punish עַ֧ל <S%H5921><s%> and כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַדּוֹלֵ֛ג <S%H1801><s%> all those that leap עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַמִּפְתָּ֖ן <S%H4670><s%> on the threshold בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In the same day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Who הַֽמְמַלְאִ֛ים <S%H4390><s%> which fill בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> houses אֲדֹנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H113><s%> their masters' חָמָ֥ס <S%H2555><s%> with violence וּמִרְמָֽה׃ <S%H4820><s%> and deceit ס

וְהָיָה֩ <S%H1961><s%> become בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And it shall come to pass in that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he נְאֻם־ <S%H5002><s%> saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ק֤וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [that there shall be] the noise צְעָקָה֙ <S%H6818><s%> of a cry מִשַּׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> gate הַדָּגִ֔ים <S%H1709><s%> from the fish וִֽילָלָ֖ה <S%H3215><s%> and an howling מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמִּשְׁנֶ֑ה <S%H4932><s%> from the second וְשֶׁ֥בֶר <S%H7667><s%> crashing גָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and a great מֵהַגְּבָעֽוֹת׃ <S%H1389><s%> from the hills

הֵילִ֖ילוּ <S%H3213><s%> Howl יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> ye inhabitants הַמַּכְתֵּ֑שׁ <S%H4389><s%> of Maktesh כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for נִדְמָה֙ <S%H1820><s%> are cut down כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> for all עַ֣ם <S%H5971><s%> people כְּנַ֔עַן <S%H3667><s%> for all the merchant נִכְרְת֖וּ <S%H3772><s%> are cut off כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All נְטִ֥ילֵי <S%H5187><s%> all they that bear כָֽסֶף׃ <S%H3701><s%> silver

וְהָיָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> will come בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> And it shall come to pass at that time הַהִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> I אֲחַפֵּ֥שׂ <S%H2664><s%> [that] I will search אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> Jerusalem בַּנֵּר֑וֹת <S%H5216><s%> with candles וּפָקַדְתִּ֣י <S%H6485><s%> and punish עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <S%H376><s%> the men הַקֹּֽפְאִים֙ <S%H7087><s%> that are settled עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in שִׁמְרֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8105><s%> on their lees הָאֹֽמְרִים֙ <S%H559><s%> that say בִּלְבָבָ֔ם <S%H3824><s%> in their heart לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> will not יֵיטִ֥יב <S%H3190><s%> will not do good יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> do יָרֵֽעַ׃ <S%H7489><s%> neither will he do evil

וְהָיָ֤ה <S%H1961><s%> will become חֵילָם֙ <S%H2428><s%> Therefore their goods לִמְשִׁסָּ֔ה <S%H4933><s%> shall become a booty וּבָתֵּיהֶ֖ם <S%H1004><s%> and their houses לִשְׁמָמָ֑ה <S%H8077><s%> a desolation וּבָנ֤וּ <S%H1129><s%> they shall also build בָתִּים֙ <S%H1004><s%> houses וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵשֵׁ֔בוּ <S%H3427><s%> but not inhabit וְנָטְע֣וּ <S%H5193><s%> [them] and they shall plant כְרָמִ֔ים <S%H3754><s%> vineyards וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִשְׁתּ֖וּ <S%H8354><s%> but not drink אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יֵינָֽם׃ <S%H3196><s%> the wine

קָר֤וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [is] near יוֹם־ <S%H3117><s%> day יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> The great קָר֖וֹב <S%H7138><s%> [it is] near וּמַהֵ֣ר <S%H4118><s%> and hasteth מְאֹ֑ד <S%H3966><s%> greatly ק֚וֹל <S%H6963><s%> [even] the voice י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> of the day יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD מַ֥ר <S%H4751><s%> there bitterly צֹרֵ֖חַ <S%H6873><s%> shall cry שָׁ֥ם <S%H8033><s%> it גִּבּֽוֹר׃ <S%H1368><s%> the mighty man

י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> That day עֶבְרָ֖ה <S%H5678><s%> of wrath הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> [is] a day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he י֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day צָרָ֣ה <S%H6869><s%> of trouble וּמְצוּקָ֗ה <S%H4691><s%> and distress י֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day שֹׁאָה֙ <S%H7722><s%> of wasteness וּמְשׁוֹאָ֔ה <S%H4875><s%> and desolation י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day חֹ֙שֶׁךְ֙ <S%H2822><s%> of darkness וַאֲפֵלָ֔ה <S%H653><s%> and gloominess י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> a day עָנָ֖ן <S%H6051><s%> of clouds וַעֲרָפֶֽל׃ <S%H6205><s%> and thick darkness

י֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> A day שׁוֹפָ֖ר <S%H7782><s%> of the trumpet וּתְרוּעָ֑ה <S%H8643><s%> and alarm עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> Against הֶעָרִ֣ים <S%H5892><s%> cities הַבְּצֻר֔וֹת <S%H1219><s%> against the fenced וְעַ֖ל <S%H5921><s%> Against הַפִּנּ֥וֹת <S%H6438><s%> towers הַגְּבֹהֽוֹת׃ <S%H1364><s%> and against the high

וַהֲצֵרֹ֣תִי <S%H6887><s%> And I will bring distress לָאָדָ֗ם <S%H120><s%> upon men וְהָֽלְכוּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> that they shall walk כַּֽעִוְרִ֔ים <S%H5787><s%> like blind men כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> Because לַֽיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD חָטָ֑אוּ <S%H2398><s%> because they have sinned וְשֻׁפַּ֤ךְ <S%H8210><s%> shall be poured out דָּמָם֙ <S%H1818><s%> and their blood כֶּֽעָפָ֔ר <S%H6083><s%> as dust וּלְחֻמָ֖ם <S%H3894><s%> and their flesh כַּגְּלָלִֽים׃ <S%H1561><s%> as the dung

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> nor כַּסְפָּ֨ם <S%H3701><s%> Neither their silver גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> nor זְהָבָ֜ם <S%H2091><s%> nor their gold לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יוּכַ֣ל <S%H3201><s%> shall be able לְהַצִּילָ֗ם <S%H5337><s%> to deliver בְּיוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> them in the day עֶבְרַ֣ת <S%H5678><s%> wrath יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD'S וּבְאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> by the fire קִנְאָת֔וֹ <S%H7068><s%> of his jealousy תֵּאָכֵ֖ל <S%H398><s%> shall be devoured כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> but the whole land כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for כָלָ֤ה <S%H3617><s%> riddance אַךְ־ <S%H389><s%> Indeed נִבְהָלָה֙ <S%H926><s%> even a speedy יַֽעֲשֶׂ֔ה <S%H6213><s%> for he shall make אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <S%H3427><s%> of all them that dwell הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> in the land ס
